sentence: In Wisconsin, Democratic Senate candidate and Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry on Wednesday unveiled a plan "strengthening American Democracy" which includes ending the filibuster and other reforms."
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Democratic Senate candidates put changing the filibuster front and center

sentence: Among the candidates are Mandela Barnes, the current lieutenant governor; Alex Lasry, son to a part-owner of the Milwaukee Bucks; Sarah Godlewski, current state treasurer; and Tom Nelson, current Outagamie County executive.
author: Salena Zito
title: The tea leaves in Wisconsin look promising for Republicans
